page.title: 07ROE END FARM (PART 2)
page.content: Mr.Rowe has 71 Fresian cows,only 66 for milking.Each produces 5843 litres a year & his quota is 387,339.The milk is sold to the Milk Marketing Board. The cows eat grass in summer & in winter they are given silage with barley,soya,sugar-beet & minerals. The grass is fertilised during winter. Almost 1000 tonnes of silage is made for winter after being treated with chemicals.The cows are milked by machine 8 abreast,but some needing individual attention are milked in the old parlour. Mr.Rowe grows a variety of cereal crops & also vegetables.There are 2 types of wheat,Aquila & Avalon,both are treated with chemicals. There is a very old granary over a pond,& 2 other grain stores holding 600-740 tonnes.
